articles.description: Costco is upping its minimum pay to $16 an hour because "paying employees good wages makes sense," W. Craig Jelinek told the Senate Budget Committee.
articles.content:
Sen. Lindsey Graham (R-S.C.) on Thursday found himself to the right even of the chief executive of a major corporation as the two debated a $15 minimum wage.
Costco CEO W. Craig Jelinek couldn’t qui… [+3171 chars]
